P007047.project_name: Guayaquil and Guayas Water Supply Project

project_abstract.cdata: The project consists of design and construction of water supply facilities including treatment plants, transmission lines, distribution networks and metered house connections for Guayaquil and communities in the Guayas province. The project also includes the provision of funds for a water supply master plan up to the year 2000.
